verses.verse: Moreover the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH3947>, Take you a great<WH1419> roll<WH1549>, and write<WH3789> in it with a man<WH582>'s pen<WH2747> concerning Maher<WH4122>–shalal–hash–baz.

The Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> also unto me again<WH3254>, saying<WH559>,
Forasmuch<WH3282> as this people<WH5971> refuses<WH3988> the waters<WH4325> of Shiloah<WH7975> that go<WH1980> softly<WH328>, and rejoice<WH4885> in Rezin<WH7526> and Remaliah<WH7425>'s son<WH1121>;

Now therefore<WH136>, behold, the Lord brings up<WH5927> upon them the waters<WH4325> of the river<WH5104>, strong<WH6099> and many<WH7227>, even the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804>, and all his glory<WH3519>: and he shall come up<WH5927> over all his channels<WH650>, and go over<WH1980> all his banks<WH1415>:

And he shall pass<WH2498> through Judah<WH3063>; he shall overflow<WH7857> and go over<WH5674>, he shall reach<WH5060> even to the neck<WH6677>; and the stretching out<WH4298> of his wings<WH3671> shall fill<WH4393> the breadth<WH7341> of your land<WH776>, O Immanuel<WH6005>.

Associate<WH7489> yourselves<WH5971>, O you people, and you shall be broken in pieces<WH2865>; and give ear<WH238>, all<WH3605> you of far<WH4801> countries<WH776>: clothe<WH247> yourselves<WH2865>, and you shall be broken in pieces; clothe<WH247> yourselves<WH2865>, and you shall be broken in pieces.
Take<WH5779> counsel<WH6098> together<WH5779>, and it shall come to nothing<WH6565>; speak<WH1696> the word<WH1697>, and it shall not stand<WH6965>: for God is with us<WH410>.
For the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> thus to me with a strong<WH2393> hand<WH3027>, and instructed<WH3256> me that I should not walk<WH3212> in the way<WH1870> of this people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>,
Say<WH559> you not<WH7195>, A confederacy, to all them to whom this people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, A confederacy<WH7195>; neither fear<WH3372> you their fear<WH4172>, nor be afraid<WH6206>.
Sanctify<WH6942> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> himself<WH4172>; and let him be your fear, and let him be your dread<WH6206>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary<WH4720>; but for a stone<WH68> of stumbling<WH5063> and for a rock<WH6697> of offense<WH4383> to both<WH8147> the houses<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, for a trap<WH6341> and for a snare<WH4170> to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.
And many<WH7227> among them shall stumble<WH3782>, and fall<WH5307>, and be broken<WH7665>, and be snared<WH3369>, and be taken<WH3920>.
Bind up<WH6887> the testimony<WH8584>, seal<WH2856> the law<WH8451> among my disciples<WH3928>.
And I will wait<WH2442> upon the Lord<WH3068>, that hides<WH5641> his face<WH6440> from the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, and I will look for him<WH6960>.

Behold<WH3206>, I and the sons whom the Lord<WH3068> has given<WH5414> me are for signs<WH226> and for wonders<WH4159> in Israel<WH3478> from the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, which dwells<WH7931> in mountain<WH2022> Zion<WH6726>.

And when they shall say<WH559> unto you<WH1875>, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits<WH178>, and unto wizards<WH3049> that peep<WH6850>, and that mutter<WH1897>: should not a people<WH5971> seek<WH1875> unto their God<WH430>? for the living<WH2416> to the dead<WH4191>?
To the law<WH8451> and to the testimony<WH8584>: if they speak<WH559> not according to this word<WH1697>, it is because there is no light in them<WH7837>.

And they shall pass<WH5674> through it<WH7185>, very distressed and hungry<WH7457>: and it shall come to pass<WH7456>, that when they shall be hungry, they shall fret<WH7107> themselves<WH7043>, and curse their king<WH4428> and their God<WH430>, and look<WH6437> upward<WH4605>.
And they shall look<WH5027> unto the earth<WH776>; and behold trouble<WH6869> and darkness<WH2825>, gloom<WH4588> of anguish<WH6695>; and they shall be driven<WH5080> to darkness<WH653>.
